description:
Therabody® is the wellness tech leader with a mission to inspire and enable every body and mind to keep moving. Therabody’s product ecosystem includes category-creating innovations in wellness products, proprietary software, digital content, and biometrics that have proven benefits around alleviating stress and pain and enhancing performance and sleep. Not only is it part of our brand ethos to help others, but we are also defining the cutting edge of wellness technology while winning accolades such as Fast Company’s Brands That Matter, Oprah's Favorite Things 2022 and the TIME Best Inventions 2022 award.

Therabody is seeking a Director, Brand Marketing - Sports that will help grow brand awareness and drive sales with a focus on sports and athletes. The Brand Manager will participate in every aspect of our brand experience including positioning, competitive analysis, and helping the brand grow across different verticals. The ideal candidate embraces innovation, creativity, and collaboration, with an analytical and a data-driven approach to create world-class marketing across channels. They are passionate about creativity and telling our story in innovative ways that excite customers, while embracing our company’s mission of helping everybody. Under the guidance of our Marketing team, the Brand Manager will build and execute marketing plans that energize, activate and retain the Therabody community around the world.

Key Responsibilities
• Develop and implement a comprehensive brand marketing strategy in conjunction with sports marketing, that supports our performance line of products focused on sports and athlete-related initiatives in alignment with the overall brand strategy.
• Assist in developing marketing calendar to deliver against key moments, promos and campaigns targeted at key audiences that roll into larger brand calendar.
• Work cross functionally with sales, design, production, events, social, influencer, partnerships, and PR to gather input on audience needs and ensure strong alignment with marketing strategy.
• Plan, execute, and evaluate marketing initiatives that target student athletes.
• Work cross functionally with product development, legal, science, sales and consumer insights to define research objectives, identify market trends, conduct market research and gather consumer insights.
• Leverage market research and consumer insights to inform new product positioning, messaging and go-to-market strategies for our performance line of products.
• Identify and develop sports-related partnerships, and collaborations to enhance the brand's visibility and credibility within the sports industry.
• Build collaborative relationships within the sports industry and key partners to identify unmet needs.
• Develop creative solutions that take our storytelling to the next level and inspire the target audience.
• Brief creative content to internal design team for target audience.
• Be connected with audience needs through frequent in person interaction.
• Set and measure key KPIs for initiative.
• Demonstrate in-depth understanding of marketing and project management.
• Drive innovation and collaboration across organization.

The Right Person Would Have
• 7+ years experience in a brand marketing, product marketing, sports marketing or brand management role
• Proven expertise in developing relationships within the sports industry
• Knowledge of marketing and/or brand strategy, including positioning and architecture, gained from agency and/or brand side experience.
• Proven track record of leveraging data driven research/analysis to drive strategic direction and optimize marketing programs.
• Strong project management skills to effectively plan, prioritize, and execute various brand activities within tight deadlines.
• Strong Power Point and MS Office/Mac skills.
• Good communication and presentation skills.
• Creative, innovative and ability to generate ideas.
• Excellent interpersonal skills to work with cross functional team.
• Event & budget management experience.
• Media knowledge.

Therabody is committed to diversity, equity and inclusion. We will not tolerate discrimination in employment, employment-related decisions, or in business dealings on the basis of race, color, genetic information, age, sex, sexual orientation, religion, disability, ethnicity, national origin, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, or any other legally protected status. We will strive to provide an environment free of discrimination to our team members, customers, guests, and suppliers. We seek contributors from all backgrounds and walks of life to join our team, and we encourage our employees to bring their empowered, passionate, and authentic selves to work every day.
